name: Happy Citizen (Tom)
uniques: Gain [2] [Gold] <in [Luxury resource] tiles> <upon turn start>  <when above [10] Happiness>
Gain [5] [Gold] <in [Great Improvement] tiles> <upon turn start> <when above [10] Happiness>
Never appears as a Barbarian unit
Comment [It's Tom ! When he's happy, he give you gold ! he like hiking. . .]

name: Happy Citizen (Madeleine)
uniques: Gain [5] [Gold] <in [Luxury resource] tiles> <upon turn start> <when above [30] Happiness>
Gain [10] [Gold] <in [Great Improvement] tiles> <upon turn start> <when above [30] Happiness>
Never appears as a Barbarian unit
Comment [It's Madeleine ! When She's happy, she give you gold !(more gold) ! She like history.]

name: Happy Citizen (Édouard-Valérie BelFontaine de Jouvernaisinaz)
uniques: Gain [15] [Gold] <in [Luxury resource] tiles> <upon turn start> <when above [50] Happiness>
Gain [30] [Gold] <in [Great Improvement] tiles> <upon turn start> <when above [50] Happiness>
Never appears as a Barbarian unit
May Paradrop up to [6] tiles from inside friendly territory
Comment [It's Édouard-Valérie BelFontaine de Jouvernaisinaz ! When he's happy (and becaus he's really very very rich), he give you a lot of gold!.Also, he likes war]

name: Historian
uniques: Can instantly construct a [Tourist site: forgotten civilization] improvement <by consuming this unit>
Can instantly construct a [Tourist site: destroyed civilization] improvement <by consuming this unit> <in [City ruins] tiles>
